metadata.title: CVE-2025-21613 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: go-git is a highly extensible git implementation library written in pureGo. An argument injection vulnerability was discovered in go-git versionsprior to v5.13. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allowan attacker to set arbitrary values to git-upload-pack flags. This onlyhappens when the file transport protocol is being used, as that is the onlyprotocol that shells out to git binaries. This vulnerability is fixed in5.13.0.

criterions.comment: golang-github-go-git-go-git package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
